LanguageData.OG_Imperial_Militarum_General.title: imperial guard general
LanguageData.OG_Imperial_Militarum_General.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] had a long career within the Imperial Guard and has reached the rank of General. [PAWN_pronoun] was a member of the Lord General's Staff and was charged with giving orders to multiple regiments of troopers.
